oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Daniel Hoge Bruce from his "Dear Friend"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to Daniel Hoge Bruce, Co. A, 51st Va. Inf., Regt., CSA, from his friend, Addie. At the time of the letter, Bruce was awaiting release from Ft. Delaware Prison. Responding to Bruce's request for a monetary loan, Addie writes, "I regret very much that I cannot send you some money, but circumstances, over which I can have no control require all the money that can be had."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
